programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.sub-title: Ernest T. Bass Joins the Army

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A preacher urges the residents of Mayberry to relax and enjoy the simple pleasures of life.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
